name: Aditya Kulkarni
title: Full-Stack Developer
summary: I am passionate about creating and facilitating hackathons that inspire and empower students and developers to solve real-world problems with technology. My experience at Anurag Hackorio has honed my skills in event coordination and leadership. With a Bachelor of Technology degree in Computer Science from Anurag Group of Institutions, I am proficient in various programming languages and technologies. Eager to apply my knowledge and skills in a professional setting, I am seeking an internship opportunity where I can contribute to innovative projects and further develop my expertise.

projects.title: Career Guidance
projects.description: We developed a website that provides career and educational data, skill and aptitude tests, and a chatbot, implemented via APIs and integrated with Streamlit, to track student progress and guide their career paths.

projects.title: HealthConnect Emergency Locator System
projects.description: I built a website that locates healthcare centers and automatically sends patient details and location to nearby hospitals during emergencies, using Geocoding, Geolocation, Places APIs, and Twilio for automated calls.

projects.title: Ainexa Jobs
projects.description: I built a LinkedIn-like website that automatically sends resumes and documents to companies of interest or suggests companies where users have higher chances of securing a job.

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: Conducted research on Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), focusing on improving the accuracy and efficiency of RAG pipelines through advanced retrieval strategies and model fine-tuning. Worked under the guidance of college professors, contributing to data preprocessing, model training, and performance evaluation.
